title: Лондон
body:
Лондон, ах, Лондон …

Няма друг град, който толкова сериозно да се е загнездил в сърцето ми и да не дава никакви индикации да излезе от там … Това ми е едва третото ми посещение, но го обичам като роден , без никакво логично обяснение защо 🙂

Няма да ви занимавам с лиричните си отклонения, а направо пристъпвам към конкретния ден :

Пристигнахме с Wizzair предния ден и прекарахме нощта, както и…

blog.title: Sirius LupinXRemus Black
blog.description:
✨ Orion is the star of a hurt can ✨

In dog years I'm dead

people think that the werewolf howls at the moon, but he is howling at the star he loves the most

summary:
[Remus reading Peter Pan to James and Sirius]
Sirius: So that Peter Pan goes all over London kidnapping children to take them to...
body:
[Remus reading Peter Pan to James and Sirius]


Sirius: So that Peter Pan goes all over London kidnapping children to take them to another world?


Remus: No, that’s not what …


James: He takes them to Neverland, why he do it and what does it mean?


Remus: No James, it’s not …


Sirius: MOONY, WE DIDN’T WANT A HORROR STORY, WE DON’T WANT TO HEAR ANYMORE


James: That was scary

tags: fantastic beats and where to find them
summary: Thanks for tagging me, @signal-bike-rider-mach 38))) Unfortunately, I don't know who I can tag myself, so anyone who sees it -...
body:
Thanks for tagging me, @signal-bike-rider-mach 38)))
Unfortunately, I don’t know who I can tag myself, so anyone who sees it - feel free to use the template! 38)))


Name: Novikova Al (Alena) [Olegovna]

Country: Russia

Age: 21

Profession: Still a student, studying medical technologies and machinery

House: Slytherin

Wand: Ebony wood with a Unicorn hair core 12" and Slightly Springy flexibility

Patronus: Doe

Ilvermorny House: Thunderbird

Favorite Potter book: The Philosopher’s Stone. I can still distantly remember reading it for the first time…

Favorite Potter Film: I have to say its a tie between The  Philosopher’s Stone and The Prisoner of Azkaban

Favorite Fantastic Beasts Ship: Queenie and Jacob, perhaps

Favorite Harry Potter Ship: I have a soft spot for Drarry, but I suppose I ship Golden Trio more in the end…

Favorite Fantastic Beast: Overall I would go with the Swooping Evil, but Hippogriffs have a special place in my heart as well.



Favorite piece of merchandise I own: I don’t actually have any HP merch aside from books and movies themselves…

Favorite Character from Fantastic Beasts: While all of the main cast are my precious children, Jacob Kowalski is a treasure!~

Favorite Harry Potter candy: Obviously, I never had a chance to try any of them, but I believe that if I did I would probably take a liking to  Peppermint Toads

Do you like Butterbeer: Same as the sweets, I have never tasted it, so I can’t really answer this… However, I am curious about the taste…

Favorite spell: Alohomora is a special case, I would say, but aside from it I am more interested in complicated charms and artifacts that we never learned names for…

What do you love most about the fandom: The sense of certain… timelessness, if you will. No matter how much time passes I would argue you will always be able to find it (at least, in some form or another)

What excites you most for COG?: Truth be told I try to hold myself from getting excited about coming out movies (thanks, The Last Jedi, I still hate you ==), but I am looking forward to seeing Jacob, Newt, Queenie and Tina again!.. And I must admit my curiosity as to how Dumbledore and Flamel will be portrait…

reblog.comment:
Thanks for tagging me, @signal-bike-rider-mach 38)))
Unfortunately, I don’t know who I can tag myself, so anyone who sees it - feel free to use the template! 38)))

blog.name: ao3feed-jily

Heya! This is an account that automatically posts new James/Lily fanfics!
icon made by @willhsrondale on twitter

summary: I don't want to be your friend
title: I don't want to be your friend
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2vEv9j7

by Bearearteres

Jily one shot. “I can’t be your friend anymore James. It hurts too much. I can’t be around you feeling this way, feeling like your the only person in the world, like you’re all I need, when my heart is breaking into a thousand pieces.” Sitting in the common room after patrols, Lily realises exactly what James means to her, and how much she needs him. Fluffy!

Words: 2596, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings

  • Relationships: James Potter/Lily Evans Potter

title: #ATripThroughDiagonAlley
body:
School is starting up and we know just where to get all your school supplies, Diagon Alley! This week we’ll be highlighting where you need to go!

“He tapped the wall three times with the point of his umbrella.

The brick he had touched quivered – it wriggled – in the middle, a small hole appeared – it grew wider and wider – a second later they were facing an archway large enough even for Hagrid, an archway on to a cobbled street which twisted and turned out of sight.

‘Welcome,’ said Hagrid, ‘to Diagon Alley.’

He grinned at Harry’s amazement. They stepped through the archway. Harry looked quickly over his shoulder and saw the archway shrink instantly back into solid wall.

The sun shone brightly on a stack of cauldrons outside the nearest shop. Cauldrons – All Sizes – Copper, Brass, Pewter, Silver – Self-Stirring – Collapsible said a sign hanging over them.

‘Yeah, you’ll be needin’ one,’ said Hagrid, ‘but we gotta get yer money first.’”

- Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone/Philosopher’s Stone

Can you guess where we’re headed first?
body_abstract: School is starting up and we know just where to get all your school supplies, Diagon Alley! This week we’ll be highlighting where you need to go!

by treehousesinfrance

Sirius and Remus write home with the long-due news of their relationship

Rated T for language.

Is this angst? I don’t know…

In dog years I'm dead

people think that the werewolf howls at the moon, but he is howling at the star he loves the most

body:
Wolfstar And Drugs

Remus: Sirius, are you drugged?


[Sirius totally drugged]: Moony, I don’t usually get high, but when I do drugs I become another person and that person does drugs and a lot

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application
